name: Half Dead Prince
description:
Play as a prince with a curse that causes him to be half dead. Allowing him to explore both the living and spirit realm. Thankfully he has experience with a sword and can use his realm shifting ability to dodge attacks and even phase through enemies.

Didn't have enough time to finish the art for player so hopefully you're up for being a cue ball.

Controls:
WASD or arrows to move
Q and E to pick up and drop weapons
Space to shift between the realms
Left click to attack
